[[Image:Ghost Hill Pin.png|thumb|right|A map showing the location of Ghost Hill on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Ghost Hill''' is a castle in [[Dorne]], the region controlled by [[House Martell]] of [[Sunspear]]. The castle is located in the north-east of Dorne on the shores of the [[Sea of Dorne]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/dorne/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Dorne entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Ghost Hill is the seat of House Toland. It is located on the Broken Arm of Dorne.
